00303         SerialStream::SerialStream() :

00310 
00311         inline
00312         SerialStream::~SerialStream() {
00313             // 
00314             // If a SerialStreamBuf is associated with this SerialStream
00315             // then we need to destroy it here.
00316             //
00317             if( mIOBuffer ) {
00318                 delete mIOBuffer ;
00319             }
00320         }
00321 
00322         inline
00323         void 
00324         SerialStream::Close() {
00325             //
00326             // If a SerialStreamBuf is associated with the SerialStream then
00327             // destroy it.
00328             //
00329             if( mIOBuffer ) {
00330                 delete mIOBuffer ;
00331                 mIOBuffer = 0 ;
00332             }
00333         }
00334 
00335         inline
00336         const bool
00337         SerialStream::IsOpen() const {
00338             //
00339             // Checks to see if mIOBuffer is a null buffer, if not,
00340             // calls the is_open() function on this streams SerialStreamBuf,
00341             // mIOBuffer
00342             //
00343             if ( ! mIOBuffer ) {
00344                 return false ;
00345             }
00346             return mIOBuffer->is_open() ;
00347         }
